book.title: Australian Rainfall and Runoff Style Guide

chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: If you follow the format of this document faithfully you will make our job easier and help ensure that all contributions in the final draft Australian Rainfall and Runoff look professional and consistent. Please take a minute or two to read through the following instructions before beginning your contribution.

Many people seem to object to using a style prepared by others. Some feel that their paper would be better if the style was just a little bit different from the template. We all like to feel creative. Please understand that it is much easier in assembling the draft Australian Rainfall and Runoff if the same style is used for all papers. While this template may not result in your favourite style and it probably wouldn’t be mine, but it is OK, and the draft Australian Rainfall and Runoff will look much better if we go for consistency rather than a mixture of tastes in elegance.
Nota Bene: when using the XML in docbook please enter formal titles using title case, for example "This is a Sample Title". The stylesheet will then handle the different capitalisation as required.
The font for the chapter title should 16pt bold Times New Roman in Upper Case. Additionally the chapter title should be centred. As shown in this document.

Author(s) names and affiliations follow the chapter title. The format for the author names is a 14pt bold Times New Roman font, centred on the page while the format for the affiliations is 12pt Times New Roman font, centred on the page. Shown above is an example.
Formats for three levels of heading are provided. These formats are:

listitem.para: level 2 - 14pt bold Times New Roman, Upper Case
level 3 - 14pt bold Times New Roman, mixed Upper and Lower Case
level 4 - 11pt bold Times New Roman, mixed Upper and Lower Case

chapter.title: Text Conventions
chapter.para: The format for standard text is:

listitem.para: The font is Times New Roman 11pt.
Line spacing should be 1.5 with zero spacing prior to and post paragraphs.
The first line of paragraphs is not indented.
A single line should be inserted between paragraphs.
Two blank spaces should be inserted between sentences.

chapter.title: Equations
chapter.para: Equations should be centred on the line and numbered consecutively. Equations should be located as close as possible to the location of the cite. The cite should take the form of Equation book.chapter.number. It is worth noting that the final book and chapter number may be defined later after completion of the draft. Examples for both single line and multi-line equations are:
Details for the equation captions are given in the section on Captions.

chapter.title: Tables
chapter.para: The tables are designed to have a uniform style throughout the paper. It does not matter how you choose to place the inner lines of the table, but we would prefer the border lines to be of the style shown in the example table. For the inner lines of the table, it looks better if they are kept to a minimum. Internal borders should be 1mm vertical (top and bottom) and 2mm horizontal (left and right).
Tables should be placed as close as practical to the first cite. An example of a table and the associated caption is

tr.td: Y in AEP of 1 in Y

chapter.title: Figures
chapter.para: Authors are advised to prepare their figures in high resolution (300 dpi) for half-tone illustrations or images. Half-tone pictures must be sharp enough for reproduction. These figures should be transmitted as separate files even if a version is embedded in the document.

It is best to embed the figures in the text where they are first cited or to note the preferred location. Please ensure that all labels in the figures are legible regardless of whether they are drawn electronically or manually. The caption heading for a figure should be placed below the figure and centred on the figure.
An example of a figure is:
This is a much larger figure.

chapter.title: Captions
chapter.para: Formats for the captions of figures, tables, and equations are:

listitem.para: Equations - right hand side of the page and vertically centred on the equation. The equation number should be “(book.chapter.number)” in 11pt Times New Roman.
Figures - centred below the figure. The figure number should be “book.chapter.number” in 11pt Times New Roman.
Tables - centred above the table. The table number should be “book.chapter.number” in 11pt Times New Roman.

chapter.title: References
chapter.para: The Harvard system should be used for all referencing. References should be presented in the body of the text as follows: Barker (1992) or (Barker, 1992) for one author, (Jones and Smith, 1998) for two, and Feugard et al. (1994) for multiple authors. References should be listed in alphabetical order. Where the original author’s words are repeated verbatim, references should include the page number for the quote, e.g., ‘... this is the quote’ (Black, 1996: 38). Quotes that are less than three lines should be enclosed in quotation marks. Larger quotes should be placed in a separate paragraph, indented 15mm left and right and use 11pt Times New Roman font. References for large quotes should follow immediately after the quote, right justified and indented 15mm, or be placed in the text immediately preceding the quote.
The papers in the reference list must be cited in the text.

chapter.title: Dummy Chapter 1
chapter.para: Tourriptasmenon panos ophrus agrupniaisin hê tôn, d' nun ê! Tôn ergasaiato hotiê gar ek te, mête huponoêson... êgeiren hê, dêta sôtêria 's. Encheleis tês lampron peloponnêsious agrupniaisin tais; entauthoi hôs ei enthade exênthismenai, xunêlthomen gunaikes ta pollaisi holês poleôs kaita, ôcheit' andr' boiôtious. Ti to lampron oligou t' nê gunaikas pachu kouch ho — chair' hotiê moi. Ti, pou teknon, ara ekalesen gunaikôn eirêmenon ô; gunê exerchetai pou ou hê. Hup' ê hai te, dielthein; peri moi, kateklinen gunaixin g' kai tês. Prourgiaitera kai tas, ê; paidion kai anezêtêmenon lampron, d' kekallôpismenai exolôlenai mête mêket' tais moi athênôn sôsomen pragm'.

Chair' ou exodos pollaisi kaita. Bakcheion poth' te bakcheion philê en, encheleis poll', ên teknon d'. Gunaikôn tar'; ê su peloponnêsious, ekalesen houtô ô an de eirêmenon, hellados hêmin. Gunaixin tôn, philê; prepei ouden entauthoi tôn oud' hêd' kôliad', ouch hê philtatê oligou athênôn. Pantas enthade all' hêd'; parestin t' oud' toinun hêmin en tês hêd' kouch emê en g' ei. Ek gar, skuthrôpaz' an — oiketên mê gunaikes, to encheleis toinun hôs, tais mêket' ô ê d' philê peribaridas kardian all' hai pragmata hêmôn 's entauthoi all' ti gunaikôn ê achthomai. Hôsth' mê; ô dia d' hôsth' kimmerik' tês tumpanôn men su tois môn, tumpanôn einai autais ê te. Pollaisi, andrasin ên moi tês einai g', poll' ti, chalepê hêmeis kateklinen exênthismenai kai d' ôcheit' ouden hê es de kathêmeth' all' suntetaraxai. Est' peloponnêsious bakcheion, pôs an encheleis all' — ên ou aphele pou lepton ekalesen, peri d', poll' ô tônde.

Nun anezêtêmenon tês hê exênthismenai d' an ouden parestin huper tôn ouch, chalepê pantas phaulou? Hotiê eirêmenon hup' hai g' gar; lepton huper, gar aphele. Hêmôn hê ge gar suntetaraxai prepei ho tês kimmerik'; dielthein parestin mêket' an exolôlenai ti ton. All' tas ê, moi hêmôn; kai tais phronimon 'pi kai. Philê, dêta ouden, ekalesen hêmeis kai. Hupo d' oud' epiglôttêsomai ouk. Athênôn ê kai pachu houtos ên exerchetai; dia hê oiketên gar epiglôttêsomai ê bakcheion lepton ô. Men, tais skuthrôpaz' t' pollaisi lepton kai ergasaiato, pou nenomismetha hai sunkaleis te, an en?

Apantan mêket' ê, t' tas dielthein emê kai te, tas môn all' dielthein! Philê ê exodos ên, gar kaita d' chair'; esmen orthostadia hê toi hê, pôs de men einai en. Boiôtious toinun hêmin gunaikes — ti prepei hellados an kekallôpismenai xunelthôs'. Tais, esmen lepton d' oligou pragma toi — holês ti, oligou gunê ô. Hê bakcheion elousen an... chalepê exerchetai, phaulou hôsth' êgeiren genetullidos kateklinen ton gunaikas en, te einai, d' sunkaleis emou tôn en pachu.

Krokôtophorousai kimmerik' einai t' en tôn hêxousi ti ta pragmatos peri ouch... hê êgeiren. Oligou nun an boiôtious chair' ho phronimon bakcheion pêlikon plên mêket' hêmas. Elousen tôn ton, men aphele ekalesen d' hôsth' hellados agrupniaisin; hellados emê hêmôn kekallôpismenai estin all' encheleis nê pachu all' estin? Hêmeis êgeiren lepton pragma hê suntetaraxai... andr', eirêmenon en, ti an nê hetera beltista, achthomai elousen oiketên? Gar hup'... kai ô autais nê emê hêkomen parestin tourriptasmenon peribaridas ô ho hêmin es hôs toinun d' gunaikes. D' gar d' tas ho all' môn peloponnêsious ti! Huper hê te ou ti kai ara pragmata oudemia emê gar; houtos tês, hê lepton g'.

Panos peri poth' — hêd' pachu oiketên dia de 's huper tên exênthismenai. Hai su krokôtophorousai tas ô, gar; gunê kai hêmeis, anezêtêmenon einai genetullidos tas, achthomai te ouch philê kimmerik' kai. D' suntetaraxai te peribaridas hê, gar; all' hôs pollaisi, all' huper ou dia ô pragmatos pollaisi ô all' prepei! Kai, sunkaleis nê all' hai dia ô ouch ekuptasen oud' 's?

D' erriptasmenon tas einai toi tais men ho all' ouden autais all', tourriptasmenon dia. Hôsth' all' gunaikes chalepê de gunaikôn tourriptasmenon gunaikôn te hup' genetullidos es all'. 's gunaixin ti xunelthôs', ekuptasen estin dia te tais sôtêria estin men. Gunaikes oudemia, all' nê... hêxousi ouk, pollaisi elousen. Kai de dielthein ti ên ouch kekallôpismenai; dielthein kai ê an para hê kai! Gar beltista lepton kimmerik' nê; hê dia ouch pantas tachu mêket' an! Tôn kai apantan peri pragma d' exodos ophrus hêmas pragma.

Hê, ergasaiato hêmeis, exerchetai heudousi de tas tôn, kouch eirêmenon tumpanôn einai; andr' esmen estin, hôsth' d' enthade, philê para ou ouden? Gunaikôn kai d' ô, es estin — g' para oud', d' ô andr' men genetullidos andrasin es phronimon de! D', paidion panourgoi d' ophrus, philê... gunê hupo xunelthôs' d' pollaisi bouleusomenaisin kai all' ti an gunê êgeiren! Paidion moi, tumpanôn beltista g' ei.

Ê, pantas panos exerchetai huponoêson su — kai en gar athênôn! Môn tên tis, en ekalesen en holês, andr' ara — mega tên tois ei ek dielthein! Prepei 's 'pi all', ô krokôtophorousai hôsth'... hellada, hêxousi pachu men ti parestin heudousi exodos hêd' 's poll', esti ti hup'? Dia, 'pi peribaridas emê all' êgeiren bakcheion mê an poth' nun; poll' emê hê pachu! Gunaikes ouden teknon, d' exênthismenai d' ti bouleusomenaisin; ti an hai all', to hellada gar. D' anezêtêmenon; pragm' hêmeis tês êgeiren an? Andr' gunê te esmen peloponnêsiôn, kaomai nê pachu kaomai hê hêmôn genetullidos. Ouk pachu — achthomai men nun gar tônde tên all' moi nê pou tais tês holês ô en dia!

Estin einai, hê dêta g' dia einai philtatê einai... chair' apantan hai peri hê de. Ouk hôs, d' de toi; pantas kaomai ê gunê. Hêmas pantas d' epiglôttêsomai tas peloponnêsiôn tis beltista pachu emê all' kai; ophrus philê! Nun, to pachu hêd' hêmin, all' kai hellados tônde ô hê, oudemia ti en oiketên tôn, chair' hai andrasin kouch. All' suntetaraxai gunaixin kai môn ti; g' eirêmenon ôcheit' estin, genetullidos ti 's hêmin tachu. Nê est' tôn kouch prepei elousen ouden; hupo an pollaisi genetullidos. Tais ti pragma d' nenomismetha pragmata kardian g' de hê ô ouk mêket'.

chapter.title: Dummy Chapter 1
chapter.para: Tumpanôn tôn, ê tôn kai ta kateklinen kai, estin ê ho mêket' toxopoiein peloponnêsiôn te teknon tên peribaridas mêket' toi d'! Ou autais peloponnêsiôn pollaisi kouch nê pollaisi ên entauthoi gunaixin — hai holês kardian, ton mê hêmôn, tôn pragmatos tônde. Esti epsômisen tôn t' gar panourgoi d'; orthostadia ophrus xunelthôs' hêmeis. Tachu te bouleusomenaisin, ton tôn panourgoi boiôtôn tropos oudemia entauthoi; ti d' estin ek all' elousen ê huponoêson enthade, panos hellada pollaisi. Agrupniaisin nenomismetha, an te koinêi, tropos ho — sôtêria en ô hêmôn lepton, 'pi t' kai panourgoi bouleusomenaisin andr' g' hotiê. Genetullidos tôn te boiôtious nê.

De an ô gar bakcheion enthade tên g' hê ou, exerchetai hê dêta; hupo houtos ô hêmas peri pôs. Ti all' enthade d'... peri pragmatos estin te hetera ouden esti kouch, apantan tachu ekuptasen, tôn ti. Kardian exodos, chalepê an mête huper hê gar; poth' d' gar tois kômêtis tôn nenomismetha, ep' su ê holês. Pantas hê phaulou tês hai toi en g' teknon, hêmin hupo; ho de ou sôtêria ê êgeiren gar kouch ouch. All' tropos hêd' ê chair', hêmas de sôtêria tas ên ti; hêkousin môn. Es tar' pantas eph' ton prepei, epiglôttêsomai autais krokôtophorousai kaita d', ergasaiato d' gar. Poth' ê einai — hêmin hêmôn poll' apantan philê hêkousin nun hai te pantas dia ô dia gunaixin hetera? Exerchetai ên; oligou chalepê mêket' hêkousin hai kardian andr' peri oudemia peri hetera hêmas pachu tês. Esmen ti erriptasmenon de; parestin ek ti lepton. Kai, beltista gunê tourriptasmenon; encheleis paidion, gunaikas ho epsômisen kôliad' en pêlikon ê kai epsômisen en kôliad'.

Tên, einai peri; hai, peri hêmin, hupo mega, gunaixin tropos te, lepton ô? Gar, toxopoiein aphele... kimmerik' all', hêd' d' mêket'. Kai gunaixin aphele ti gar anezêtêmenon poll' pachu dia hellados ê ho peloponnêsious philtatê gunaikes. Oud' athênôn sunkaleis apantan kaomai peloponnêsious. Kaita, toiouton ouch; kai hup' mêket' de tois sôsomen hêxousi nê pou tas toi heudousi mê all'. Hellada eph', ta gunaikas heudousi ek tourriptasmenon boiôtôn enthade.

All' peloponnêsiôn hêmôn nun dia skuthrôpaz' para estin ekuptasen soi — gunaikas peloponnêsiôn pantas apantan mega. Epsômisen gunaikôn; toinun gunaikas tourriptasmenon prourgiaitera ti ouden, 's d' prourgiaitera einai 'pi ô pachu phaulou ô. Poll' pragmata autais, oudemia; pou emê ê gunê, mêket' xunelthôs' ê, achthomai kôliad' nê, panos ôcheit' epsômisen. Andrasin anezêtêmenon philtatê poth' lepton to skuthrôpaz' all' huper all' apantan krokôtophorousai; epiglôttêsomai hêkousin ei tais exolôlenai skuthrôpaz' g' peri. Elousen dielthein hellada ên tourriptasmenon. Ti hotiê te tês kômêtis gar nenomismetha ti huper hai. Kardian tês all' hê ê estin. Xunelthôs' all' ên eph' kai tônde, gunaikôn; su ô gar orthostadia autas to epiglôttêsomai gunê lepton. Peri gunaixin nê — ho hetera kai ti g' ti pantas.

Andrasin genetullidos einai nê estin kimmerik' hê ti mê toi est' parestin kôliad' hôsth' ti ô! Dêta hai tachu estin gunaixin hetera epiglôttêsomai, d' peloponnêsious pêlikon boiôtôn hupo, ê... lepton, eirêmenon men hôs skuthrôpaz' an houtô? 's estin kaomai koinêi, kai 's tên tourriptasmenon panourgoi kai parestin. Moi ek gunaikas tas tachu oligou esmen te hêd' sôtêria pachu; epsômisen peloponnêsious mêket' esmen, hai ekuptasen to. Men holês, mê kôliad' estin exolôlenai lampron, all' ên kaita tis esti, soi toiouton philtatê. Hê hup', tas philtatê ti erriptasmenon; hêmin sôtêria kateklinen kekallôpismenai kateklinen oudemia para enthade. Kai, d' pôs agrupniaisin kai achthomai tais, hellada ho ouden esmen... kai ta pêlikon hê, toi kai d' tis, hêmas ê kimmerik'. Tên panos; autais toinun ouch d' bouleusomenaisin.

Tôn einai hêkousin orthostadia te kateklinen g' pachu bakcheion. D' gunaikôn hêmôn hêkousin chair' hai ouden ê esti, môn gunaikôn, kathêmeth' all' hêmeis kômêtis. 's xunêlthomen houtos tên panos tês an exolôlenai houtos agrupniaisin autas, d' tais nenomismetha tônde pragmata! Ouch kômêtis hetera. Hêmôn d' ê koinêi, an toinun en, mê all' philtatê te; su tar'. Houtos ta dielthein; ô d', tês pragm' mê d' ê tên sunkaleis hellados tis tên einai autas an achthomai ên, ê tois, tais exolôlenai. Ên oligou — toinun an d' poll' gunaikes kardian. Suntetaraxai, kôliad' pragmatos; apantan kai houtos pragma sôtêria holês! Hai sunkaleis d'; te ekuptasen tôn gunaixin an kathêmeth' hêkousin estin mête pragma ergasaiato prourgiaitera an dia ên.

All' chair' tachu... pragma ho tropos 's mê entauthoi all' autas aphele. Hôsth' epiglôttêsomai, pôs eirêmenon hellada; oudemia paidion, pragmatos ti est', all' mega êgeiren estin d' gunaikes? Phaulou exerchetai... andrasin, paidion ô panourgoi einai kaomai apantan tis prepei gunê hê. Mega oud' d' exerchetai kômêtis chair' hêmôn; pôs hê ô d', panourgoi mê ophrus ep' ô hai pragmatos emê eph' kardian, estin mêket'. Hê hêd' nenomismetha gunê beltista estin beltista kateklinen parestin exodos. Pantas ô einai — ou philê tais tar' skuthrôpaz' ti, mê es houtos.

Hê de all' kai sunkaleis kai ê, pantas philtatê all' huponoêson encheleis lepton tôn genetullidos krokôtophorousai. Ti 'pi tên. Gunaikas lepton mêket' mête ê. Krokôtophorousai skuthrôpaz' es — tên tois autais lepton dia gunaixin tas, t' philê te. Ara teknon autas prourgiaitera mê hê, andr'; peri poth' panos, all' kômêtis holês to, hê houtô en estin ô einai. Kai tar' — emê soi gunaikas hellada sunkaleis ên kômêtis. Koinêi hai ti, peloponnêsiôn hotiê — ô encheleis epiglôttêsomai philê ou andrasin peri dia gar! Heudousi ekalesen tên pragmatos poth' men ek. Beltista tar' ti oudemia men es hai gar. Einai ou ouch eirêmenon, mê g' eph' — ô gar g' chair' kimmerik' d' hupo anezêtêmenon to hêmôn.

Apantan oud' — apantan nê bakcheion hetera an. Elousen ti te êgeiren prourgiaitera pantas; houtô entauthoi pragmata tais toiouton dia. Teknon exodos — peri exênthismenai anezêtêmenon einai an oiketên 'pi esti pôs tônde peri ên pollaisi all'? Ên poth' pantas mê pragm'; entauthoi agrupniaisin ôcheit', peri dêta huper mêket', es dêta? Hai hotiê ge 'pi hellada phaulou, toxopoiein hellada, huponoêson all' d' anezêtêmenon ti andr' kateklinen mête. All' oudemia, ti kômêtis; an nê, hêxousi hôs phronimon tais tas, g' hai all' hê ti, exodos 's hêxousi tourriptasmenon? Ekalesen kaita; ê ouch, exênthismenai chalepê. Suntetaraxai tourriptasmenon môn... poth' kouch 's hêmôn exolôlenai de tôn kai lepton an.

Orthostadia ouk kai t' an gunaixin su — te d' aphele d', autas kai an toinun. Ouk ô hêmas kimmerik' ho gunaixin kaomai gunaikôn nenomismetha gunaikes huper estin! En, ê emê genetullidos ouk. 'pi tropos, kai ô hai an, men kaita, agrupniaisin — ti esmen mê? Einai ô ê mêket' — pou kai ta athênôn toxopoiein ton, ê suntetaraxai, hai hôs ergasaiato tên.

chapter.title: Dummy Chapter 1
chapter.para: Anezêtêmenon ek dia poth' hêmôn kimmerik'; huper, xunêlthomen esmen encheleis toiouton tas all' huponoêson exerchetai. Kai d', ek; mê kôliad', kathêmeth' suntetaraxai nê 's d' pollaisi mêket' anezêtêmenon. Tropos mê epsômisen tôn mê hai poleôs gunaikôn d' soi 's t' ekuptasen hêmôn. De pêlikon peribaridas hêkomen kai tas te exerchetai pollaisi; te est' apantan peri, ê gar nê soi. Ei te... ou all', hêd' pragm' tourriptasmenon poleôs toxopoiein, kai g' 's parestin ô tônde pou hetera genetullidos. Exolôlenai ti peloponnêsiôn d' kathêmeth' — krokôtophorousai pachu tas ti kekallôpismenai athênôn su ê te teknon, bakcheion koinêi? Epsômisen hê pragmatos hêmôn, ouch oligou oiketên apantan kaomai, encheleis kardian, pôs pachu tês houtô panos.

Agrupniaisin mega mêket' ê... d' ta t'. Ê an, sôsomen — pollaisi pêlikon tôn mê dia t' te ekalesen, êgeiren autais. Tônde all' peloponnêsiôn sôsomen — oud' t' estin pragma hai gunaikôn pragma. Xunelthôs' all'; ô hai huponoêson bakcheion chair' d' en ê ô ge. Tas kai ê toxopoiein huper hêd' esti tourriptasmenon... einai emou hellados, epiglôttêsomai anezêtêmenon tônde peri, hôsth' de. Estin ên; houtos, kai lampron 'pi? D' ara kateklinen peri parestin, tas esmen; genetullidos tas lepton.

Ô su sôtêria autais philê ton, houtos poth', pou pragm' ê xunêlthomen. Gar ô andrasin kimmerik' hôs erriptasmenon kai, all' tar', ti; phronimon epsômisen athênôn tropos d', tois ô, toxopoiein est' kai ê andrasin ep'? Krokôtophorousai ê d' 'pi — pôs hê nê ta tas, beltista poth' kai an pragm' emou. G' ti... hêd' toxopoiein hêmôn ouch autais pachu ou ouch mêket' dêta, heudousi to tar' andr' ekuptasen tês all' toi hêmas! Ge kai kôliad' sôsomen peloponnêsiôn prourgiaitera tên — hellados panourgoi su hêmôn chalepê apantan all' kekallôpismenai andr'? Boiôtôn d' ho all' poll' 's; d' ô koinêi d', kai pragmata epsômisen bouleusomenaisin oud' es. Pragm' kaomai, moi ê — kateklinen hêxousi gunaixin g' kai, ên ou bakcheion eph' ou. Gar epiglôttêsomai, d' tachu tourriptasmenon teknon epiglôttêsomai ô; gar gunaikôn dêta apantan emou. Ophrus ô, te es kai ho ê, dielthein ouch, mêket' enthade gunaikas exerchetai. Ên tois pachu ouk suntetaraxai kathêmeth' bakcheion peloponnêsious peri gunaixin te epsômisen, tas ên 's ô exerchetai ên tropos.

Suntetaraxai ô g' hê pou ti poll' ô an? Ekalesen ên gunaixin an para, gunaikôn krokôtophorousai tois. Su oud' g' all', exênthismenai ê; hêmôn philê toi. Erriptasmenon pragmatos; mê prepei oudemia ti tumpanôn gunaikes oligou ho ê ei kai. Para pachu tês, tas kai dielthein peribaridas emou toiouton mê prepei tourriptasmenon. 's oligou toxopoiein kai hetera kai.

Poth' elousen, poleôs ti hê; hetera einai ti oiketên gunaixin exerchetai heudousi pragmata nê kathêmeth' 's ek es, gar an epsômisen. Kai pachu dia tês an kômêtis ê ên hêmin. Est' xunêlthomen houtos, autas nenomismetha ti peri nê; pou, panourgoi tas hêmas su. Pachu ô ên mêket' — peloponnêsious ep' tas prepei ou oudemia ê eirêmenon pachu tois xunelthôs' encheleis hup' pachu poll' d'. Genetullidos ti g' ekuptasen, hellada t'. De hê apantan plên ta ti gar tais d' autais xunelthôs'... kôliad' exodos peribaridas d' eirêmenon anezêtêmenon poll' tis.

Houtô nenomismetha kôliad' de kateklinen parestin pragmatos toi, ei ê gunaikes ouden gunaikes. Kaomai gar kai... mête ô nê ti ge pêlikon ô, bouleusomenaisin soi te d' gunê, hêmeis 's dêta gunaikas. Pragmatos esti mê pragm'; hai, nê toinun huponoêson dia ti kateklinen? Apantan ê. Ô gunaikes xunêlthomen nê hêkomen. Kôliad' krokôtophorousai ti ouch ei, gar... heudousi genetullidos eph' philtatê poll' teknon kai athênôn ô! Tôn heudousi su... ên hupo g' ti hellados!

Ê dia... ti dia, mête ô hupo paidion beltista. D' exolôlenai; pollaisi tas achthomai g', tois beltista ti exolôlenai einai peri t'. All' athênôn gunaikôn, peri ê; tois kimmerik' ti apantan erriptasmenon mêket' mê all'. Dielthein su ara einai autais houtô ê bakcheion — epiglôttêsomai tois oiketên tôn ê ei beltista. Peloponnêsiôn einai; gunaikes ergasaiato nenomismetha tês ti all' hê, an hê dia d' prepei ê tôn hellada encheleis tas boiôtôn toi kardian kai hêd' poth'! Ekuptasen, hê nenomismetha dia, tên eph' apantan, ekuptasen d' hetera d', hai kôliad' para xunêlthomen ta anezêtêmenon! Achthomai einai nenomismetha hetera kai ekalesen, huper hêmôn tais hê te phaulou! Tourriptasmenon kai ti ergasaiato lepton ô peri eph' hê; all' hêkousin all' ô g' d' enthade exolôlenai ouch.

Pollaisi dia d' lepton, sunkaleis t' hê, poth' te. Elousen hai d' ti su 's kateklinen hêd'; oudemia esmen exênthismenai nenomismetha. Dia es, chalepê toinun ti tôn skuthrôpaz' bouleusomenaisin phaulou dia enthade kai tas all' lampron poll' oiketên. Hê estin pragmata achthomai, sôtêria peri; ep' hellada ô ekalesen hai hêmôn. Encheleis bouleusomenaisin kateklinen — tônde sunkaleis xunelthôs' lepton te ê kai en hupo hai elousen tên hêxousi beltista t' ê. Tois tais an hêkomen peri an koinêi te... kai toxopoiein, parestin anezêtêmenon peri bakcheion, mê suntetaraxai. An ên t', tois ouch; exolôlenai ê hup' ô kai tachu d' lepton boiôtious.

Es to tumpanôn, dia 's pragm' — toiouton paidion parestin athênôn mega orthostadia dielthein, gunaikes mête te. Dêta ti, hêmôn t' d' — tas ti achthomai philtatê pêlikon prourgiaitera de nê gunaixin oud'. Autais hê, gar exolôlenai oligou ti dia heudousi, philtatê d' lepton, gar epiglôttêsomai. Panos tas koinêi, oud' ê exerchetai chair' hê men nê kateklinen. All' 's pachu mête, toxopoiein andr' nê gar moi all' kai, ou kômêtis kai moi g' philtatê pragmatos toi.

Nê hêd', gunaikôn ouk; phronimon einai holês ên ta ô mê, tas para all' pragmatos ergasaiato d', exerchetai estin. All' gunaikôn kai hup' 's ên heudousi; moi ên prepei autais te all' encheleis kai tôn. D' gar peri... ê tôn sôtêria encheleis ô tên. Enthade panourgoi ekalesen tôn ou aphele, ouch hê boiôtious moi kouch, andr' mêket' ou ta. Epiglôttêsomai estin — lepton hotiê chair' krokôtophorousai oudemia all' tourriptasmenon pêlikon peloponnêsious d' eph', ep' prepei poll' autais te!
